Double Caps Correct - CAps v2.1.1 Release Notes
Release Date: July 20, 2025
Author: Toshon Jennings

Highlights:
- Dual EXE packaging for user and automation workflows
- Digitally signed binaries with SHA-256 hashes
- Enhanced onboarding: ToolTip, About dialog, fallback ReadMe
- Polished icon assets and branding refinements

New Features:
- CAps 2.1.1.exe (user-friendly)
- CAps_v2.1.1.exe (automation-friendly)
- First-run ToolTip notification
- About dialog with version and trust info

Trust & Verification:
- SHA-256 hashes included in Verify_Hashes.txt
- GPG signatures (.sig files) for both EXEs
- OpenTimestamps (.ots files) created

Bug Fixes:
- Tooltip positioning on multi-monitor setups
- About dialog flicker on rapid launch/close

Included Files:
- CAps 2.1.1.exe
- CAps_v2.1.1.exe
- CAps_v2.1.1.exe.sig
- CAps 2.1.1.exe.sig
- Verify_Hashes.txt
- ReadMe.txt
